subject: Add throttled auto-commit on PostToolUse
description:
Added throttled auto-commit on PostToolUse to unified_post_tool.ts.

Evidence:
- `hooks/src/hooks/unified_post_tool.ts:23`: `const AUTOCOMMIT_INTERVAL_MS = 5 * 60 * 1000;`
- `hooks/src/hooks/unified_post_tool.ts:113`: `if (shouldAutoCommit()) { runAutoCommit(); markAutoCommitted(); }`
- Uses file-based timestamp at `~/.claude/cache/last-autocommit.txt` for cross-process persistence
- Verification: Full rewrite of unified_post_tool.ts with auto-commit logic, API key detection preserved
